data.title: YOU WILL NOT LEAVE HUNGRY
data.text: A great place to enjoy lunch on a nice day as you must eat gyros at a small space or outside at a picnic table or in your car.  All that delicious food for $6.00.  Don't come earlier then 1130am when they open.  A hidden jewel.

data.title: Awesome lunch!
data.text:
Marko's is one of my favorite places to go for a delicious power salad. Their chicken is amazing and it's always consistent! The falafel is great too!
Don't let the odd location or the trailer deter you from giving it a try. These guys do a fabulous job with putting out great food. They are only open for lunch so get there early.

data.title: Shack surprise
data.text: My son told us about a little restaurant that sold delicious chicken gyros. We drove in and saw a tiny shack attached to a food truck. Tiny shack not a little restaurant. But the food was delicious and the portions were large. Price ranges from $6 for a sandwich to $9 for a platter. They also have a salad.  Smart concept: simple menu, fair prices, good food, low overhead.

data.title: So unexpected...so delicious!!!!!
data.text: Needed to go to the RMV around lunch time. We were super hungry after waiting about an hour at RMV. The registry guy said the best place for lunch is Marko's Food Truck. Enough said and we were off. Simply stated, we were wowed!!! It was one of the best lunches we have had in a long time. Great quality FRESH food, fair price and huge portions. The herb seasoned fries are to die for (my favorite). There are a couple of picnic tables for sitting outside. We will gladly drive out of our way for many more lunches there! Search them out...it's well worth it!!! So glad the registry guy recommended it!
